_explanation.purpose: Discovery phase - identifies and adds users/actors to epics and stories in the story graph outline
_explanation.users_field: Adds users array to epics and stories. Users are actors/personas who interact with the feature (e.g., ["Admin", "Customer", "API Consumer"])
_explanation.scope: ONLY adds users arrays to existing structure. Does NOT add scenarios, steps, or acceptance criteria (those come in later phases)
_explanation.structure: Inherits story graph outline from shape phase (epics, sub_epics, story_groups, stories with sequential_order and connectors). ONLY adds users identification
